attributes.comment:
RE: Docket ID USCIS-2006-0044-0001

I am writing to protest the increase to adoption fees. Adoption is so expensive
already. Increased fees will make it that much more difficult for parents to
adopt. Increased wait times because of increased adoption oversight (i.e Hague
convention) results in parents having to go through burdensome governmental
procedures more often and to pay fees multiple times. For example, the I-600A
fee must be paid and then paid again when the adoption has not finalized within
18 months (which will probably happen in our own adoption). The same is true
for fingerprinting which must be done multiple times even though fingerprints of
an applicant never change. Adoption is very important and beneficial aspect of
our U.S. society and should not be discouraged. Thank you for your
consideration of this most important matter!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anne Moran
